name: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000
overview: Professional supercross racing comes to the Game Boy Color with JEREMY MCGRATH SUPERCROSS 2000. You can race with or against professional motocross riders like Jeremy McGrath, Travis Pastrana, Kevin Windham, Sebastian Tortelli, Jimmy Button, John Dowd, and Greg Albertyn. When you have selected the proper rider, you can race on any track in the Arcade mode. For a bigger challenge, work your way through the ranks to become champion in the 80cc, 125cc, and 150cc Seasons. In all of the races, you can gain an advantage by performing stunts to make power-ups appear, which you can collect to give you an advantage. Do you have what it takes to beat McGrath and the other professionals in JEREMY MCGRATH SUPERCROSS 2000?
